name: Animal Flow Masterclass : SIS x DizzyDuck
description: Discover Animal Flow with instructor Gowri Murthy in this energizing Koramangala masterclass—learn ground-based movement, build strength, and finish with a creative flow

name: Pour Over 101: Master Your Brew
description: Master your morning brew. This guided session covers pour-over essentials—grind, bloom, flow—for clearer flavor and café-quality coffee at home. Ideal for curious beginners and seasoned brewers alike

name: Capoeira Workshop
description: Brown Monkey Movement blends Capoeira, yoga, calisthenics, and music into a freeform flow. Expect grounding, play, strength, and stretch—all through expressive, rhythmic movement

name: Lasya: A Classical Dance Series
description: Lasya returns with artists Mythri Madhyasta & Vidya Balachandra, celebrating classical dance in all its elegant, expressive glory

name: Hidden in Plain Sight: Art Deco Around Us
description: “Hidden in Plain Sight” at Sabha Blr unpacks Bengaluru’s quiet love affair with Art Deco. This talk explores the city’s overlooked architectural gems—revealing design, history, and nuance in every detail

name: Jinhe Naaz Hai by Kahe Vidushak Foundation
description: Kahe Vidushak Foundation’s Jinhe Naaz Hai brings Bhojpuri and Hindustani culture centerstage—melding identity, resistance, and lyrical storytelling into a poignant theatrical experience

name: Drumming Workshop

location.name: My School of Rock, Koramangala
location.address: My School of Rock, Koramangala Bangalore

description: LEARN DRUMS invites beginners and seasoned players to explore rhythm in a hands-on session led by expert drummers—where technique meets creativity in a pulse-quickening workshop

name: Listening Party
description: Artist SND CHK MNJ’s listening party offers a rare dive into the artist’s latest sound explorations. An evening for audiophiles and casual listeners alike—where music meets mood in a curated sonic space

name: Kodava Kitchen

location.name: Tijouri, The Atria Hotel, Palace Road
location.address: Tijouri, The Atria Hotel, Palace Road Bangalore

description: Home chef Priya Aiyappa serves up a Kodava spread at Tijouri—think chilli pork, pandhi curry, and coconut soufflé. It’s a bold, homespun feast rooted in Coorg’s rich culinary traditions
